'''Enqelab Square''' is an important square in central [[Tehran]], [[Iran]].
==Transportation== * [[File:Street in Iran.jpg|18px]] [[Azadi Street]] * [[File:Street in Iran.jpg|18px]] [[Enqelab Street]] * [[File:Street in Iran.jpg|18px]] [[Kargar Street]] * [[File:Sinnbild Kraftomnibus.svg|30px]] [[Tehran BRT Line]] Enqelab square Station * [[Enghelab Metro Station]]
